BarChart.title: BarChart
BarChart.description: BarChart represents the configuration of a vertical bar chart widget.

colorScheme.description: Applied color scheme, one of the predefined values

customUnit.description: Custom unit (requires to have unit field set to custom to take effect)

decimal.description: Number indicating the decimal precision of the numeric values, within range 0-15

decimalPrecision.description: Whether to render numeric value without abbreviation

groupNameTemplate.description: Custom template name for a bar group, can contain variables

hashColors.description: Whether to ignore color scheme and derive colors from algorithm

maxBarsPerChart.description: Maximum number of bars on a chart

yAxisMax.description: Number indicating the upper band for y axis

yAxisMin.description: Number indicating the lower band for y axis

DashboardAction.title: Dashboard Action
DashboardAction.description: Public actions that are always available within specific dashboard's context.

id.description: A unique identifier of the action

name.description: The display name of the action

shouldOpenInNewWindow.description: Defines if the action should open in a new window or current window in the browser

widgetId.description: Reference to specific widget within a dashboard, can be null if the action is dashboard wide
